review: Good quality product, excellent content, it can be better if the Apps can work outside the U.S, if you're going to use Amazon prime or HBO and other service, be aware that only works on U.S.
author: Henry Kinkead

review: Great product! Fast and easy to use, its much better than my smart bluray dvd player. I love it and will be purchasing another one!
author: Disndat

review: it would be good if it were able to connect to 5Ghz wireless
author: Thomas Luong

review: I love this product. So far I have not really had time to play with all the features yet but it was super easy to set up and works fantastic.  It shipped really fast too.
author: Tina H "Electricgal"

review: I love my Fire TV Stick.  I travel out of town three weeks a month for three nights each week.  Since you can now login to the hotel wireless network with the Amazon Fire and Fire Stick, Iget to watch all my shows with almost no stuttering or video degradation.  Amazon Fire Stick is one of my favorite technology products.  Small, lightweight, inexpensive and exceeded my expectations.  Way to go Amazon!
author: Stephen Seay "projectstepsdotcom"

review: it is pretty good, it,s ok but it add up about the same as cable tv after you add all the different apps.
author: robert jenkins

review: I have a Roku stick and a firestick.  They are both worth the money.  I prefer the firestick but I am glad i have both.  I prefer the sticks to the boxes like Apple TV.
author: Robert W. Ritchie "BobW"
